### Average F

```{r}
plot_trend(pop$F_bar, color = ~model, legendgroup = ~model, colors = cols, ylab = "Average F")
```

### F-at-age

```{r}
plot_trend(pop$F, color = ~model, legendgroup = ~model, colors = cols, frame = ~age, ylab = "F") |> 
  add_lines(
    data = pop$mu_F |> subset(est != 1), 
    x = ~year, y = ~est, 
    linetype = ~I(2), 
    line = list(width = 0.5),
    showlegend = FALSE,
    color = ~model, 
    legendgroup = ~model, 
    colors = cols, 
    frame = ~age
  ) 
```

### Selectivity

```{r}
plot_trend(pop$S, x = ~age, xlab = "Age", ylab = "Selectivity", frame = ~year,
           color = ~model, legendgroup = ~model, colors = cols)
```
